name: Go West Connecticut Shade Robusto
additionalNotes:
http://store.lqhouseofcigars.com/gowest-connecticutshade-corona-3.aspx

Mild Body - Custom Blend - Mellow & Creamy - A 3 leaf fill featuring leaves from Columbia, Mexico, & Santo Domingo

This blend was custom blended specifically for the palette of Deputy Sheriff Ben West, former Community Police Officer of Madeira Beach, Florida.

 This blend reflects the essence of his characterâ€¦it is a smooth, down-to-earth, mellow smoke with great aromatic presence! The Go West is amazingly flavorful for a mild smoke and you can enjoy this cigar any time of day or night. This blend smokes brilliantly in every single wrapper we have ever paired it with and can be built for you in any ring gauge you desire. It is very popular with the ladies in smaller ring gauges and equally as popular in Churchills for the avid golfer.
